snippet: Warren E. Buffett, the chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway who turned 82 last month, told newspaper executives that his radiation treatments for prostate cancer had been completed.
abstract: Warren E Buffett, chairman and chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway, tells newspaper executives his radiation treatments for prostate cancer have been completed.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett, the chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway who turned 82 last month, told newspaper executives that his radiation treatments for prostate cancer had been completed.

headline.seo: Warren Buffett Says Cancer Treatments Have Ended
headline.main: Treatments for Cancer Completed, Buffett Says
headline.print_headline: Treatments For Cancer Completed, Buffett Says
